channel.title: Help me with compiler and runner please =]
channel.description:
OK so this is wuts up. (and im using windows vista and im new to vista)
my compiler i use is this to start things off: [code]@echo off title Pimpscape Compiler javac *.java pause[/code]
and when i compile i get this error: [code]'javac' is not reconized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. press any key to contunie..[/code]
Ok so this is wuts up with my runserver
I use this code: [code]@echo off title EyreScapeV2 Server java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server[/code]
Also i downloaded jdk 6.5 and for my envorimental variables i did the following: CLASSPATH [code]CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin;%CLASSPATH%; [/code]
I also made a new one called PATH and i used the code:
[code]C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin [/code]
help thanks =] [br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 11, 2008, 07:07:11 PM[/size][hr]sum one help..

item.title: Help me with compiler and runner please =]
item.dc:creator: @Magic_Shroom Magic Shroom
item.description:
@Magic_Shroom wrote:

OK so this is wuts up. (and im using windows vista and im new to vista)

my compiler i use is this to start things off:

@echo off title Pimpscape Compiler javac *.java pause

and when i compile i get this error:

'javac' is not reconized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. press any key to contunie..

Ok so this is wuts up with my runserver

I use this code:

@echo off title EyreScapeV2 Server java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

Also i downloaded jdk 6.5 and for my envorimental variables i did the following:
CLASSPATH CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

I also made a new one called PATH and i used the code:

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin

help thanks =]
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 11, 2008, 07:07:11 PM[/size][hr]sum one helpâ€¦

Read full topic
item.source: Help me with compiler and runner please =]
